dt: {bc}a system of economic control in which certain variables (such as wages and interest) are tied to a cost-of-living {a_link|index} so that both rise or fall at the same rate and the detrimental effect of inflation is theoretically eliminated

shortdef: a system of economic control in which certain variables (such as wages and interest) are tied to a cost-of-living index so that both rise or fall at the same rate and the detrimental effect of inflation is theoretically eliminated
